page.title: 06SWEET FACTORY, KIRKCALDY
page.content: In this part of Fife there is very little in the way of manufacturing industry. In Kirkcaldy there is the Alma Confectionery factory. This business employs 40 people, and since 1953 has produced a range of children's confectionery and chocolate. The current trend is away from unwrapped sweets, and the factory now places a growing emphasis on a wide range of wrapped chocolate bars. At present the range includes 'Big Bar', 'Chocolate Bears','Masters of the Universe',and 'Skull Crushers'! The weekly output of sweets is about 30 tons, and the company supplies the whole of the U.K., and as far afield as Egypt,Canada & the U.S.A.,and South America.
